DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Japan . The aim clinical trial investigate safety ( emphasis hypoglycaemia ) switch long-acting insulin analogue intermediate-acting insulin insulin degludec ( NN1250 , SIBA ) basal-bolus regimen subject type 1 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison NN1250 Versus Insulin Detemir , Both Combined With Insulin Aspart Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
